headline: 2 Healthcare Stocks for Beginner Investors With a 20-Year Time Horizon
summary: For those with decades left in their investing journey, these top healthcare stocks could be worthy portfolio contenders.

headline: Does Pfizer’s AI-Powered R&D Signal a New Opportunity for 2025?
summary: Wondering if Pfizer is a smart buy at today's price? You are not alone, especially as value-focused investors begin to focus on the stock. Pfizer's performance has been mixed lately. Shares dipped just 0.1% in the last week, inched up 1.3% over the past month, but are still down 5.9% year to date despite a 4.7% return over the last twelve months. Recent headlines about Pfizer have focused on its latest product developments and major moves in the pharmaceutical sector, generating speculation...
